title: kAttiDa vENDum
sahitya:
kAttiDa vENDum appA kaDavuLE karuNai shei karuNai shei maraNak-kadir shUzhudE


anupallavi

  tIttiraL vIsiyE sidarum aNUguNDugaL cittira vadai sheidu jagattai azhikkAdu


caraNam    Anavak-kodippuDan Ashai alaigaL pEsha arasiyarp-puyalE Attirak-kanal vIsa
kANakkaN parittiDum kAlAgni viLaiyADa kaN mUDit-tirakku mun 
maNmUDi mALAdu kaDu manap-pOrinrik-koDuttuyark-kUTrinrik
